title: Council Decision of 27 November 2012 renewing the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
header:
12.12.2012 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 382/7
COUNCIL DECISION
of 27 November 2012
renewing the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training
2012/C 382/06
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 337/75 of 10 February 1975 establishing the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training, and in particular Article 4 thereof (1),
Having regard to the three nominees submitted to the Council by the Commission as regards the employers' representatives,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decision of 16 July 2012 (2), the Council appointed the members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the period from 18 September 2012 to 17 September 2015. However, this Decision did not include all of the members to be appointed,
main_body:
The following persons are hereby appointed members of the Governing Board of the European Centre for the Development of Vocational Training for the remainder of its term of office, which runs until 17 September 2015:
REPRESENTATIVES OF THE EMPLOYERS’ ORGANISATIONS
Portugal Ms Ana Maria SANTOS GOUVEIA LOPES
Slovakia Mr Martin HOSTAK
United Kingdom Ms Kate LING
This Decision shall be published, for information, in the Official Journal of the European Union.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 November 2012.
For the Council
The President
G. DEMOSTHENOUS
(1)  OJ L 39, 13.2.1975, p. 1.
(2)  OJ C 228, 31.7.2012, p. 3.
